page.title: 20CLAYTON GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content: Near Clayton there is a garden centre managed by a man called MrR.B.Simpson. The garden centre is 1000square metres in area.At the garden centre there are lots of beds and borders filled with plants,shrubs,young trees etc,all for sale. At one end of the garden centre there is the shop which sells pot plants,insecticides,weedkiller, fertilisers, grow bags, sand and chips, seeds, bulbs and many other garden aids. There are three people who work at the garden centre. They are Mr Simpson and two ladies.At the weekend they are busier than weekdays with 40-50 customers. Monday and Wednesday are quiet. The owner of the garden centre also owns one in St. Andrews. By Brian Heggie.
